alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact southeastern La Crosse, northern Vernon and southern Monroe Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cashton, or 10 miles southwest of Sparta, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern La Crosse, northern Vernon and southern Monroe Counties, including the following locations... St Marys, Portland, Jackson Pass, The Coulee Experimental Forest, Tunnel City, Middle Ridge, Highway 131 And County A, Highway 33 And County Y, Norwalk, and Newburg Corners. This includes Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 21 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
